eg.projects

Interface ProjectActions

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Configurable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HtmlActions, JavaActions, PerlActions

    public interface ProjectActions
extends Configurable
    The interface to perform actions in a project

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void build()
      Creates a build of a project, where it is not specified what 'build' is
      default void compile()
      Compiles source files
      default void runProject()
      Runs a project
      default void runProject(java.lang.String filepath)
      Runs a project using the specified file

      • Methods inherited from interface eg.projects.Configurable

        configureProject, createSettingsWin, getExecutableDirName, getProjectName, getProjectPath, getSourceFileExtension, isInProject, makeSetWinVisible, retrieveProject, setConfiguringAction, storeConfiguration, usesProjectFile
